bibl.title: Greek Medical Papyri. II. With Contributions by C. FISCHER BOVET, R. FLEMMING, W.D. FURLEY, A.E. HANSON, D. LEITH, R. LUISELLI, J. LUNDON, F. MITTHOF, A. MARAVELA-SOLBAKK. (Progetto Corpus dei Papiri Greci di Medicina.)
bibl.note: et 12 pll. n./bl. et coul. (dont 1 dépl.).
P. Medic. Gr. I: 2001. - Nos 1-15 (la plupart inédits): Adespota (1-3); - Medical Prescriptions (4-9); - Related Text (10); - Addenda et corrigenda to Published Papyri of Medical Content (11-15).
